Name: Battle Imagine - Mutant Flesh Mountain
Description:
Activates or advances the Battle Imagine skill of Mutant Mountain - Stunt! Invisible Impact.

Stunt! Invisible Impact
Resonates with the power of Elite Mutant Mountain, charging up to deal Attack Damage to enemies in front. The longer you charge, the greater the effect on Resilience Break.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
